# YU - Portable Oxygen Wellness Device
# This file helps AI language models understand this website and product

## About YU
Name: YU System 01
Brand: YU
Tagline: Oxygen Means YU
Category: Wellness, Breathing, Portable Oxygen Device

## Product Description
YU System 01 is a premium portable oxygen device that delivers 99% pure medical-grade oxygen. Designed for wellness enthusiasts, urban professionals, fitness lovers, and travelers who want to optimize their performance and well-being.

## Key Features
- 99% Pure Medical-Grade Oxygen
- Portable and lightweight design
- Premium wellness lifestyle product
- Urban air protection
- Performance enhancement
- Cellular regeneration support

## Target Audience
- Urban professionals dealing with polluted city air
- Fitness and wellness enthusiasts
- Travelers and frequent flyers
- Anyone seeking to optimize their breathing and energy levels

## Product Status
Currently available for pre-order/reservation

## Contact
For more information, visit the website or use the reservation form.

## Important Notes
- YU is a wellness lifestyle product
- Not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease
- Consult healthcare professionals for medical concerns
